title: Speakers are quieter than normal.
body: So I have a set of Bose Companion speakers for my computer. They sound great for me but I have noticed that they have recently started to be more quiet than they were before. My volume is 100% in both League and windows sound settings so I'm not too sure what it could be. I also checked the cables and everything seemed fine. I got them about a year ago. Is it because they are just old now? Any advice would be great.

replies.body:
Hey!

It's pretty unlikely that they just all of a sudden got quieter cuz' they're older. Has anything changed with your sound card? Updated drivers, new sound card software, etc?
